2000s.menu.how_to_play.about_2000s_messa:
§2About 2000s Edition§r

2000s Edition is a what-if Legacy Console Edition released for the 6th Gen Consoles?

§eAbout This Modpack§r

This modpacks aims into recreate TU9 as close as possible but with a twist, what if it released in the 2000s? This modpacks changes the User Interface, Creative Listing, Crafting Listing, Sounds, and everything else that makes it like TU9 from Legacy Console Edition.

§eFeatures§r

§lTU9 Accuracy§r
It aims to recreate Title Update 9 with it's UI, items, blocks, terrain, and mob spawning. There's some that can't really be recreated.
§lOpen Source§r
2000s Edition is mostly composed of open-source mods and resource packs. It's also avaiable on Codeberg, which gives you the ability to see the code and contribute to the modpack. It's also avaiable as a packwiz project.

§eNot your cup of tea?§r

That's fine, consider checking out what other legacy modpacks made by Nostalgica Reverie and alternatives that are on the wiki article on the mod page.
